Cards.Title: Batteries for light?
Cards.Description:
- Have a battery meter than runs out as you use your light. 
- Find battery powerups to recharge it.

Cards.Title: Improve Kanban Board
Cards.Description:
- Add scroll view to columns so you can have as many cards as you need.
- Same with horizontal scroll for board, to hold columns. 
- Add confirmation popup for deleting columns/cards. Or an undo function. 
- Add one higher level so you can have multiple boards. 
- Fix how board has forced min size when making editor smaller.

Cards.Title: Player State Machines
Cards.Description:
- One machine for air/water
- One for actions, like movement, get hit, die.

Cards.Title: Breath/Air System
Cards.Description:
- Air meter that counts down while you're underwater. 
- Surfacing refills it.
- Better scuba suits hold more air.

Cards.Title: Have Harpoon Gun Follow Mouse
Cards.Description:
- Similar to CrossCode
- Setup controller joystick for aiming too.
	- Right stick aim, left stick move, right trigger shoot.
